contentList:
-- Actor Your Charisma increases by 1. Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance Checks. You have become a true thespian. Your Charisma increases by [1]. Your Proficiency Bonus is doubled for Deception and Performance Checks. -- Athlete Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1.

When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%. Your Strength is increased by 1.

When you are Prone, standing up uses only [1] of your movement speed. Your Jump distance is increased by 50%. Your Dexterity is increased by 1.

When you are Prone, standing up uses only [1] of your movement speed. Your Jump distance is increased by 50%. -- Durable Your Constitution increases by 1. You regain full hit points each time you take a Short Rest. You regain full hit points when you take a Short Rest. Your Constitution is increased by [1]. -- Heavily Armoured You gain Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1. You have Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength is increased by [1]. -- Heavy Armour Master Your Strength increases by 1. Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour. Your Strength is increased by [1]. Incoming damage from non-magical attacks is reduced by [3] while you're wearing heavy armour. -- Lightly Armoured You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1. Your Strength is increased by [1], and you have Armour Proficiency with Light Armour. Your Dexterity is increased by [1], and you have Armour Proficiency with Light Armour. -- Moderately Armoured You gain Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1. Your Strength is increased by [1], and you have Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields. Your Dexterity is increased by [1], and you have Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields. -- Performer You gain Musical Instrument Proficiency, and your Charisma increases by 1. Your Charisma is increased by [1] and you know how to play musical instruments. -- Tavern Brawler When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added to the damage and Attack Rolls.

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1. When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added to the damage and Attack Rolls.

Your Strength or Dexterity is increased by [1]. Tavern Brawler: Strength Your Strength is increased by [1]. Tavern Brawler: Dexterity Your Dexterity is increased by [1]. -- Resilient You increase an Ability by 1, and gain Proficiency in that Ability's Saving Throws.
